txt.en: Ingredients for metalsmithy are obtained from prospectors, suppliers, and metalsmith vendors. You may sometimes need to trade with foresters as well, but these are rarer items needed much later in your crafting career. You can trade mode materials with players or visit the auction hall to find offerings.\n\n<rgb=#FF00FF00>NOTE: Ingredient packs can also be found on the LOTRO Store.
How can I get ingredients for metalsmithy?
